name: Charlie's Animal Rescue Centre

address: Prananvum,1/1 Sultanpalya,First Cross, Behind Pushpanjali Theatre

briefDescription: Charlies Animal Rescue Centre-CARE works with injured, abandoned and abused animals in Bangalore city and surrounding areas. We run a free ambulance service for trauma cases, adoption of abandoned animals,inpatient facility, All kinds of animal surgeries, volunteering with shelter animals, canine therapy
